metadata.description: Core relationships that define the fundamental connections in the U-CORE ontology

relationships.name: Resonates With
relationships.description: Harmonic resonance relationship indicating vibrational alignment

relationships.name: Aligns With
relationships.description: Alignment relationship indicating structural correspondence

relationships.name: Emerges From
relationships.description: Emergence relationship indicating complex arising from simpler components

relationships.name: Projects To
relationships.description: Projection relationship indicating manifestation across dimensions

relationships.name: Measures
relationships.description: Measurement relationship indicating quantification or assessment

relationships.name: Participates In
relationships.description: Participation relationship indicating active involvement

relationships.name: Structured By
relationships.description: Structural relationship indicating organizational pattern

relationships.name: Described By
relationships.description: Descriptive relationship indicating characterization

relationships.name: Implements
relationships.description: Implementation relationship indicating realization of abstract concepts

relationships.name: Integrates
relationships.description: Integration relationship indicating synthesis and unification

relationships.name: is_a
relationships.description: Taxonomic relationship indicating type hierarchy

relationships.name: Part Of
relationships.description: Mereological relationship indicating whole-part structure

relationships.name: Causes
relationships.description: Causal relationship indicating cause-effect dynamics

relationships.name: Influences
relationships.description: Influence relationship indicating partial causal effect

relationships.name: Relates To
relationships.description: General associative relationship

relationships.name: Enables
relationships.description: Enablement relationship indicating facilitation

relationships.name: Manifests As
relationships.description: Manifestation relationship indicating expression or appearance

relationships.name: Transcends
relationships.description: Transcendence relationship indicating going beyond limitations

relationships.name: Contains
relationships.description: Containment relationship indicating inclusion

relationships.name: instance-of
relationships.description: Instance relationship linking an entity to its meta-type

relationships.name: defines
relationships.description: Definition relationship, e.g., module defines type

relationships.name: exposes
relationships.description: Exposure relationship, e.g., module exposes API

relationships.name: has_field
relationships.description: Type has field member

relationships.name: has_content
relationships.description: Node has derived or attached content

relationships.name: has_content_type
relationships.description: Node linked to its content media type

relationships.name: belongs_to_axis
relationships.description: Concept belongs to an ontology axis

relationships.name: concept_on_axis
relationships.description: Concept is placed on axis (alias for belongs_to_axis)

relationships.name: from_source
relationships.description: News item from a source

relationships.name: maps_to_axis
relationships.description: Node mapped to U-CORE axis for classification

relationships.name: maps_to_concept
relationships.description: Meta-node mapped to U-CORE concept

relationships.name: has_child
relationships.description: Reverse of is_a for hierarchy navigation

relationships.name: axis_parent_of
relationships.description: Axis parent-of child axis

relationships.name: axis_child_of
relationships.description: Axis child-of parent axis

relationships.name: axis_has_keyword
relationships.description: Axis linked to keyword concept

relationships.name: axis_has_dimension
relationships.description: Axis linked to dimension concept

relationships.name: axis_has_type
relationships.description: Axis linked to its type concept

relationships.name: Resonates With
relationships.description: Harmonic resonance relationship indicating vibrational alignment between concepts from different domains

relationships.name: Reflects Pattern
relationships.description: Indicates that one concept reflects or mirrors the pattern of another across different scales or domains

relationships.name: Contains Whole
relationships.description: Holographic relationship where each part contains information about the whole system

relationships.name: Transcends and Includes
relationships.description: Spiral relationship where higher levels transcend but include lower levels, creating evolutionary progression

relationships.name: Cross-View Synthesis
relationships.description: Integrates multiple perspectives, belief systems, or worldviews into a coherent understanding

relationships.name: Dialectical Tension
relationships.description: Holds opposing concepts in creative tension, allowing for synthesis at a higher level

relationships.name: Fractal Scaling
relationships.description: Shows how patterns repeat at different scales, from micro to macro levels

relationships.name: Spiral Evolution
relationships.description: Shows cyclical but progressive development, where each cycle includes and transcends the previous

relationships.name: Holographic Mapping
relationships.description: Maps information from one domain to another, where each domain contains the pattern of the whole

relationships.name: Paradox Resolution
relationships.description: Resolves apparent contradictions by finding higher-order truth that includes both perspectives
